urls.title: footer
urls.description: After applying the promo code on the ‘payment’ page, an alert will display along with text explaining that you may have an invalid code. If your promo code is registering ’invalid’ please click the following criteria:   Re-enter the code ensuring there are no spaces within the field.  Is your booking for a single passenger only? Our unique promo codes are valid for single adult passenger bookings. If your booking has more than one passenger, a separate booking with a valid promo code must be made to receive the discount.  Make sure you have not redeemed this promo code on another flight booking - promo codes are valid for single use only.    If your promo code is from the 'Thank you from Qantas' promotion, make sure your return booking includes a Qantas operated flight. Australian residents can redeem the promo code on Australian domestic or international return flights departing Australia. New Zealand residents can redeem the promo code on international return flights departing New Ze

data.text:
"Jolly good, the post is here! ✉️"

In November 1922 the first ever @Qantas air mail flight took to the skies to deliver 106 letters from Charleville to Cloncurry on behalf of @auspost.

100 years later we were privileged to be able to reenact this historic journey. https://t.co/8GPPnCbDio
